[[olingo4]]
= Olingo4

[.badges]
[.badge-key]##Since Camel Quarkus##[.badge-version]##1.0.0-M4## [.badge-key]##JVM##[.badge-supported]##supported## [.badge-key]##Native##[.badge-supported]##supported##

Communicate with OData 4.0 services using Apache Olingo OData API.

== What's inside

* https://camel.apache.org/components/latest/olingo4-component.html[Olingo4 component], URI syntax: `olingo4:apiName/methodName`

Please refer to the above link for usage and configuration details.

== Maven coordinates

[source,xml]
----
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.camel.quarkus</groupId>
    <artifactId>camel-quarkus-olingo4</artifactId>
</dependency>
----

Check the xref:user-guide/index.adoc[User guide] for more information about writing Camel Quarkus applications.

== SSL in native mode

This extension auto-enables SSL support in native mode. Hence you do not need to add
`quarkus.ssl.native=true` to your `application.properties` yourself. See also
https://quarkus.io/guides/native-and-ssl[Quarkus SSL guide].
